product_name: Pacsafe StashSafe 100 GII Anti-Theft Fanny Pack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The PacSafe StashSafe 100 GII Anti-Theft Fanny Pack gives you peace of mind while traveling, thanks to its clever security features and intuitive organization. Body features eXomesh(R) slash guard, a stainless-steel mesh that protects contents from bag slashers. Carrysafe(R) strap is slashproof and lockable, so you can anchor the fanny pack to a secure fixture, like a cafe chair. RFID-blocking pocket protects credit cards and passport from identity thieves who use RFID scanners. 2 main zippered compartments; 1 rear zippered pocket; 1 padded pocket for phone or other device. Headphone port; key- and wallet-ring. PacSafe StashSafe 100 GII Anti-Theft Fanny Pack features a breathable padded mesh backing for comfort while wearing. Closeout.
short_description: The PacSafe StashSafe 100 GII Anti-Theft Fanny Pack gives you peace of mind while traveling, thanks to its clever security features and intuitive organization.
